message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with natural language generation and text summarization, which are topics that fall under the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural networks (cs.NE), and information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper specifically focuses on training an LSTM auto-encoder to preserve and reconstruct multi-sentence paragraphs, which is a task that involves both language modeling and neural network architecture design. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, and cs.IR.
